resources.string:
Many people contributed to this project and we did not have to apply force to any of them, this makes us happy. Also those people and their brilliant minds make us happy for

  • being awesome
  • testing and elimination of bugs
  • giving hints and suggestions
  • supplying images and ideas

The best way of saying thank you is by thanking them: thanks.

First but not least, thanks to my bro and brother Fabian! Without you, this would not exist.

Looking for the author of an individual image? Don't panic! This dialog is made for this case.. and some other cases.

  1.   Non riddle image authors
    •  
  2.  Testers and contributers
    •
Touch one circle to pop them into 4 smaller ones until the image is visible.
Tilt the device and thus move the cell. Collect toxic candies, grow bigger, don\'t touch walls and EXPLODE.
Create dices by touching an empty field. Move and combine dices with equal numbers to reveal the image.
Press inside a triangle to create smaller ones.
Touch to jump or keep pressed to doublejump over obstacles. Each one will slowly reveal the image
Brain .. full ... cannot .. remember more . riddles ...
Grow bigger and explode to see the image!
Bild nicht vorhanden?! Externen Speicher prüfen!

Die App ist ein Freizeitprojekt von den Brüdern Fabian und Daniel, die ich stolz meine Schöpfer nennen darf. Daniel, mein Professor, und Fabian, mein Meister, haben ein Anti-Werbungs-Wurmloch installiert, das dich vor Pop-ups und Müll schützt. Über anderweitige Unterstützung freuen sie sich trotzdem!
Schreibt ihnen, schaut euch das Projekt an unter "https://github.com/DanDits/WhatsThat" oder setzt eine anonyme Spende ab.

Stay awesome! :)

string-array.name: contact_mail_body
string-array.item:
Erdlinge und Urheberrechte: eine Katastrophe.
Meine Schöpfer benutzen daher nur Bilder mit freier Lizenz. Gib für das angehängte Bild folgende Punkte an:

Autorname oder Psyeudonym:
Evtl. Bildtitel:
Quelle (z.B. Website):
Lösungswort:
Bevorzugtes Rätsel:

Das hier ist nur für hyperintelligente und bescheidene Wesen wie beispielsweise mich!
Solltest du meinen Meister einen Vorschlag schicken, präzisiere deine Beschreibung, insbesondere:
Was ist die Idee? Wie ist das Feld aufgebaut? Wie kann ich etwas verändern? Wie wird das Bild sichtbar? Usw.
Eine Skizze im Anhang hilft meinem Meister, deine wirren Gedanken zu verstehen.
Vielleicht nimmt er sogar Kontakt mit dir auf, wenn dein Vorschlag gut ist und noch Fragen im Detail aufwirft.

Glückwunsch, ich dachte ich hätte die meisten Käfer vernichtet :(

Wo ist der Fehler aufgetreten?
Ist die App abgestürzt?
Was hast du getan?
Was ist (nicht) passiert?
Was sollte passieren?
Meine Meister freuen sich über positives Feedback oder sonstige Verbesserungsvorschläge aller Art.\nNegatives Feedback wird höchstwahrscheinlich vom Wurmloch verschlungen werden.

Oh große und erhabene Erlauchtheit, ich traue mich kaum diese Worte auszusprechen, doch trotzdem erhebe ich mein unwürdiges Haupt und blicke allen Mut fassend in eure allwissenden Augen und stammle ein kleinlautes ...Hallo
Frank, someone found it. Call the assassinator, this must not get public.

resources.string: You know nothing. Or do you recognize the picture with only %2$d circles?
Count all circles in a game and admire the artist.
Well then do this job again for %1$d more pictures.
Finish a game within %1$d seconds but more clicks than wipes.
Clicks > wipes for a few more games.
Finish two…ok let\'s say one riddle in less than %1$d seconds.
sorry…Don\'t wanna bother ya. %1$d games within %2$d seconds.
The first circle needs some attention. Talk with it.
Thank you for completing my useless tasks :).
Create %2$d circles. Don\'t look at me like this. The prof is a math guy. He knows what he\'s doing …%3$d is inadequate. %4$d is of course absurd. You got %1$d.
Be fast or he will look into your soul.
Because going slow is boring: max speed %1$d/%2$d.
Explode %1$d times in a game without kissing the wall.
Touch the wall as Angry Cell. Again and again.
Relax and stay healthy. No candy.
Hit the walls %1$d times using the explosion pressure.
You know that the wall will not help you?
Solve %1$d riddles with only one explosion.
Collect %1$d more tasty candies as Angry Cell.
Combine the Alien-Cube on each colour in a game. Let the games begin!
Gather geen, yellow and red 1–6 and purple 7–9. No resets!
Get all hints for this riddle. Why? Because this is very complicated and it took my master enough effort, so you gotta read it!
Collect any number of a green dice 15 times without any resets.
Gather %1$d green dices on the field. Just kidding. %2$d.
Collect a purple, green, yellow and red %3$d in a game without any reset. Progress: %1$d/%2$d
Reveal some fields completely in one game.
%1$dx Alien, %2$dx purple, %3$dx green, %4$dx yellow on the field :).
.Ecid wolley yna gninibmoc tuohtiw erutcip a hsinif
Take an alien %1$d and a yellow %2$d for a walk.
Psst… tell them we come in peace.
Reveal one field completely in %1$d seconds and then get off.
It\'s a bad job, but someone has to do it, right?
Something tells you to perfectly uncover the mystery.
Choose one of the four inner fields by combining any dices. Perform 75 more combinations on this field without any resets (requires X-ray-vision).
I know, this is the last one. But there must be an opposing side of perfectionists (required). So finish this with only 30 combinations. Good luck.
It\'s like Ying&Yang. Ever heared of it?
The answer, to life, to universe and everything. Plus the number of horns of a unicorn
You failed 30 times in easy. Are you sure you wanna continue playing this game?
Perform xxx Double Jumps in a game before reaching \"hard\".
So much for the laws of physics...
Finish a game after reaching \"hard\" without colliding.
Congratulations. You dodged more than xxx obstacles.
Wow. You beat my creators records. Write an email and tell your record by writing "Skyline record" in the subject line.
Still a better lovestory than twighlight
Cuddle Knuffbum at \"ultra hard\" half a dozen.
Going for a short walk of 42195 meters.
Enough of the easy beginning? Well...get the right upgrades my friend.
